# Premios

## ALFIM2016 {.center}


```{python}
import trimesh
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.path import Path
#ImagenEntrada=trimesh.load('stl/VienaPellets.stl')
intracav=trimesh.load('stl/viena/intracav.stl')
pellets=trimesh.load('stl/viena/pellets.stl')
support=trimesh.load('stl/viena/support.stl')
ring=trimesh.load('stl/viena/ring.stl')
needles=trimesh.load('stl/viena/needles.stl')
pellets_color = [1.0, 0.5, 0.0, 1.0]
support_color = [0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0]
ring_color = [1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0]
pellets.visual.face_colors = pellets_color
support.visual.face_colors = support_color
ring.visual.face_colors = ring_color
scene = trimesh.Scene()
scene.add_geometry(intracav)
scene.add_geometry(pellets)
scene.add_geometry(support)
scene.add_geometry(needles)
scene.add_geometry(ring)
scene.show()
```
